lines.text: You can't give blood to a member of your own family.
Why can't I?
Why can't you? Why can't you?
That was my question, yes.
Well because that's, that's... That's incest.
Now look you people! This isn't some godforsaken border town where you can just, uh, go about as you please and, and bother innocent people and do... do... do... Mexican things!

[Candy lies before Grindl]
There is a place where the immutable self resides. We must search. Now, could it be here?
[places hands on Candy's head]
No, I do not think so. Perhaps it is here.
[squeezes Candy's right breast]

[surprised]
m-m-m-m-m-mmm.
No, wrong again
[squeezes Candy's left breast]
Mmmm-m-ah.
No. Or here.
[grabs Candy's crotch]

[sharp intake of breath]
No. I think, I mean it seems to me couldn't be there
I think it is. So soon, we found it so soon! It must be a sign!
I know what the kids call me behind my back.
The kids don't call you anything behind your back, daddy.
That's exactly what I mean. All the other teachers in this school have nicknames. I'm just plain old Mr. Christian.
Oh for God's sake, Need can't be kept waiting. Need is here. Need... is now!
[repeated line]
Emmanuel is good boy!
Hey, did you see this one on the first bike?
She looks like an ad in that magazine you get.
Whips and Chains?
No, the other one, Leatherladies.
Oh, you're right, she does!
Who were they, hm? I couldn't see much down there but I could see enough to tell that they were scum. Were they Albanians?
Oh, no, no, no it was just a personal thing.
I got a nose for Albanians. They looked like Albanians to me.
No, no, they were just some Mexicans.

[after his men have just counted off]
Pretty damned impressive, right?
I'll say. All those men counting right up to 24 without a single mistake.
War certainly seems to be hell.
Nobody loves your daddy any more than I do. I'd chop off my right arm for him.
You're left handed.
Well, that's beside the point.
His mental capacity will be reduced to the level comparable to that of a rather mature cucumber.
Good God, Harris, watch what you're doing! You're a brain surgeon, not a gynecologist!
This hospital is filled with very sick people!
You must remember that scientifically speaking the only difference between life and death is that death lasts a lot longer.
I majored in abnormal psychology and I know orgies when I see them. I also know depravity and indecency and, I might ad, in flagrante delicto!
I don't know what that means.
It means that you are to leave this place immediately.
In my book you are a tart! A tramp! A trollop! A... teenager.
You'd better let go of me or I'll break every bone in your pelvis.
You're trying to out diagnose a world renowned surgeon who has attended eight institutions of higher education and who has more degrees than a thermometer.
I have now filmed 112 people saying the word 'no'.
But I don't know anything about acting.
Neither does the Grand Canyon, but that doesn't keep anyone from looking at it.
Did you see what happened to the girl in the blue dress?
Who directed it?
Now, rubadubdub.

[the Hunchback juggler has just disappeared through a painting]
Just one of those old, stereo-realists tricks, Sarge.
Do not put your material shoes under holy water!
What shall I do with them?
Throw them into the material world!
Gosh!
Gosh isn't the half of it.
They say in my country that the centipede has a thousand legs but he cannot tapdance.
I don't quite see the connection.
Well, it loses a little something in translation.

[standing directly behind Candy while holding her hips]
Now bend forward slowly.

[while bending]
Ah-Oooooooooo.
I'll tell you when to say Oooo.

The poem that I just recited to you was composed in a hospital in Burma as I lay close to death, having been savagely beaten by a... a horde of outraged Belgian tourists. You will find this poem in my collected verse entitled... "Forests of Flesh".
I... am MacPhisto.
Hello, I am Candy, Candy Christian.
Candy... beautiful name, it has the spirit and the sound of the Old Testament.
